event.name: Virtual Speaker Series: Sabrina Dorsainvil
event.shortDescription: As the Director of Civic Design for MONUM Sabrina Dorsainvil uses her design and illustration skills to influence complex issues such as healthcare, human rights, and housing.

description.html: As the Director of Civic Design for MONUM(Mayor’s Office of New Urban Mechanics) Sabrina Dorsainvil uses her design and illustration skills to influence complex issues such as healthcare, human rights, and housing. She’s fascinated by human interactions(with each other and their environment), and focuses her work on improving the lives of everyday people.
